item.description:
This event will feature games that are noisier than the average game.

Unlike quiet games (which are quiet), noisy games might include lots of dice, beeping or buzzing timers, bells, or an abundance of vocal participation. Noisy games can be word games, card games, party games, strategy games or video games.

 

Some examples of noisy games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • Pit
  • Big Boggle
  • Dice Town
  • Yahtzee
  • Space Alert
  • Aargh! Tect
  • Pictionary
  • Encore
  • Catch Phrase
  • Outburst
  • Wii

So this is your chance to play a bunch of louder than average games, without disrupting anyone any more than they are disrupting you. Feel free to suggest other noisy games not listed here. You are welcome to bring your own noisy games and ear plugs.

I'm up for playing until 11:30ish and then I'll start to clean stuff up/put chairs away.

---

Food/Snacks:

We can place a take-out order for dinner if people are interested.

I'll have some beverages available. Please feel free to bring snacks.

---

About the location:

We will be playing in the community room of the Essex building.

Please meet at the front door of The Essex condo (11 Church St, Salem - across from what some folks call "the Almy's parking lot" - you'll see the green awning) and then I will take everyone downstairs to the Essex Room. Those who arrive later will need to call me to get in (978-219-9292). My number/directions will be posted on the front door.

If you park in the garage I can sell you a validation sticker that gives you free parking.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Noisy Game Night in Salem
